name: Bear
description:
Metaphors are firmly woven into the canvas of language (here's the first metaphor for you), which would be a faded piece of fabric without them.
However, the brightness and imagery of language is not the only merit of metaphors.
After all, they also explain complex concepts that we encounter for the first time, help us find common ground with each other and even shape our mental processes. In short, they help to better understand the world.

Artwork made by Maksym Denysenko in 2010 in Crimea(one of the first artworks in authors tech) Spray paint on canvas 80x50cm 2492x4006 pix
